input_data.text_prompt:
Precise facial feature replacement for the restaurant IP character three-view design. Replace ONLY the facial features with exact characteristics from reference image (input/吼巷/设计/IP/微信图片_20251011163705_33_639.jpg).

KEY FACIAL FEATURES TO MATCH (in order of importance):

1. ROARING MOUTH EXPRESSION (CORE IDENTIFIER - 95% precision required):
   - Exact mouth opening shape and degree (wide, exaggerated roaring)
   - Precise teeth display pattern and arrangement
   - Tongue position and shape (visible pink tongue)
   - Inner mouth color (bright pink/red)
   - Mouth corners and lip formation
   - Overall roaring expression quality (joyful, exaggerated, characteristic)

2. EYES (90% precision required):
   - Exact eye shape (round/oval/elongated)
   - Eye size and proportions
   - Eye spacing and position on face
   - Pupil and iris details
   - Eye expression and emotion
   - Surrounding eye area details

3. EARS (if visible - 90% precision):
   - Number of ears (note if THREE ears present in reference)
   - Ear shape (triangular cat-like or other)
   - Ear position and angle
   - Ear size relative to head

4. NOSE (85% precision):
   - Nose shape and structure
   - Nose size and position
   - Nostril representation

5. HEAD SHAPE AND PROPORTIONS (85% precision):
   - Overall head shape and contour
   - Head size relative to body (maintain coordination)
   - Head-to-neck connection (natural transition)
   - Facial feature layout (upper/middle/lower face proportions)

6. FACIAL DETAILS (80% precision):
   - Any whiskers or facial hair
   - Facial patterns or decorative elements
   - Facial texture and shading
   - Light and shadow treatment on face

PRESERVE 100% (absolutely no changes):
- Body posture and stance
- Limbs position and gesture
- Body color scheme and patterns
- Three-view layout format (front/side/back)
- Background and environment
- Overall character proportions (body only)

EDIT STRATEGY:
- Edit area: Face/head region ONLY
- Edit strength: VERY HIGH (0.95) for facial similarity
- Blend mode: Natural transition at neck connection
- Quality goal: 90%+ facial similarity to reference image
- Style consistency: Maintain cohesive cartoon/IP design style

CRITICAL SUCCESS FACTORS:
1. The roaring mouth expression must be EXTREMELY accurate - this is the character's signature feature
2. Facial features must match reference at 90%+ similarity
3. Body must remain 100% unchanged from current satisfactory version
4. Head-to-body connection must look completely natural
5. Overall design must feel unified, not like a face swap

Reference the exact facial characteristics from: input/吼巷/设计/IP/微信图片_20251011163705_33_639.jpg
